homepage.introduction:
We are seeking your participation in a study on people's travel behavior in the Montreal area. This study aims to better understand the trips of people living in the Greater Montreal Area.

More about this survey
homepage.pageTwoIntroduction:
You already completed the first part. The second part will focus on the travel behavior of your household's members.

To sign in, please use the same email and password that you provided when you did the first part, or use the same Google or Facebook account.

postregistration.info: You will need this information if you want to reconnect to your interview or if you want to use another computer to access it.

auth.authenticationFailed: Your email address or password was not found or is invalid
auth.pleaseChooseAUsernameOrEnterYourEmail: To participate, please provide your email address
auth.pleaseChooseAUsernameOrEnterYourEmailAnd: To register, please enter your email address, choose a password and confirm it, or use your Google or Facebook account.
auth.usernameOrEmailAlreadyExists: Your email address is already registered. PLease use your existing account.
auth.WhyLoginInfo: Because of the survey length, we propose that you connect with an email, or Google or Facebook account, so that you can come back later to finish the survey. You may choose to continue without an account, but you will not be able to finish the survey if your session expires.

visitedPlace.editVisitedPlaces: Edit, insert or delete location a location
visitedPlace.resetVisitedPlaces: Reset visited places and trips for this person
